titles.title: A resolution to disagree to the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 3621 and request a conference.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 3621 (Mission Indian lands), with a Senate amendment thereto, disagreeing to the Senate amendment, and requesting a conference with the Senate.
